label: DEUTSCHE STAATSANGEHOERIGKEIT?
question english: What citizenship do you have? If you have several citizenships, please name all of them.
answer english: Germany, Greece, Italy, Croatia, Poland, Russian Federation, Turkey, Other country, None, stateless
reference-text: While 10 percent (169 persons) of the entire population is not born in Germany, only 5 percent of them (76) has no German citizenship

label: BEFR.: VON GEBURT AN DEUTSCH?

reference-text: They are less German since birth, which means that in major cities more initially foreign nationals acquire German citizenship

label: GEBURT IM HEUTIGEN DEUTSCHLAND?
question german: Sind Sie im Gebiet des heutigen Deutschland geboren?
question english: Were you born within the current borders of Germany?
reference-text: The two main dependent variables are being born outside Germany and not having German citizenship
